normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies

unnormalised: Good news for all you environmentally conscious folks in India! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced boosted subsidies for rooftop solar installations, and it’s a game changer.
normalised: Good news for all you environmentally conscious folks in India! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) just announced boosted subsidies for rooftop solar installations, and it's a game changer.

unnormalised: Thinking of finally slapping some panels on your roof before Onam? Now's the time! The Central government is offering up to 40% subsidy for systems up to 3kW. That’s a significant saving that'll make your wallet sing louder than a Bollywood song.
normalised: Thinking of finally slapping some panels on your roof before Onam? Now's the time! The Central government is offering up to forty percent subsidy for systems up to three kilowatt. That's a significant saving that'll make your wallet sing louder than a Bollywood song.

unnormalised: For installations between 3kW and 10kW, expect around 20% subsidy. Imagine all the extra biryani you could afford with those savings!
normalised: For installations between three kilowatt and ten kilowatt, expect around twenty percent subsidy. Imagine all the extra biryani you could afford with those savings!

unnormalised: These subsidies, channelled through state DISCOMs like BESCOM in Bangalore, are designed to make solar power more accessible to middle-class homes across the country.
normalised: These subsidies, channeled through state D I S C O M S like B E S C O M in Bangalore, are designed to make solar power more accessible to middle-class homes across the country.

unnormalised: The scheme hopes to power up homes across the nation and help make India more self-reliant in energy needs, cutting down on reliance on fossil fuels. So, ditch those energy bills and embrace the sun, folks! Check with your local DISCOM for exact details and application procedures. Don't delay – these subsidies won't last forever!
normalised: The scheme hopes to power up homes across the nation and help make India more self-reliant in energy needs, cutting down on reliance on fossil fuels. So, ditch those energy bills and embrace the sun, folks! Check with your local D I S C O M for exact details and application procedures. Don't delay – these subsidies won't last forever!
